mapper.insert:
insert into dae_cd( dae_cd, dae_nm, use_yn, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date
) values( #{dae_cd}, #{dae_nm}, #{use_yn}, #{input_id}, #{input_date}, #{update_id}, #{update_date} )
mapper.update: update dae_cd set dae_nm=#{dae_nm}, use_yn=#{use_yn}, input_id=#{input_id}, input_date=#{input_date}, update_id=#{update_id}, update_date=#{update_date} where dae_cd=#{dae_cd}
mapper.select: select dae_cd, dae_nm, use_yn, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date from dae_cd where dae_cd=#{dae_cd}
select dae_cd, dae_nm, use_yn, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date from dae_cd
